com.cyc.base.inference

Interface InferenceAnswer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CycBackedInferenceAnswer, ResultSetInferenceAnswer

    public interface InferenceAnswer
    An interface for representing one answer to a Cyc query.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAnswerID()
      Returns the identifier for this answer within its inference.
      Object getBinding(CycVariable var)
      Returns the value to which var is bound in this answer
      Map<CycVariable,Object> getBindings()
      Returns the set of bindings for this answer for all query variables.
      InferenceAnswerIdentifier getId()
      Returns the identifier for this answer.
      Collection<InformationSource> getSources(InformationSource.CitationGenerator citationGenerator)
      Return the sources to which this answer is attributed.

    • Method Detail

      • getBinding

        Object getBinding(CycVariable var)
                  throws CycConnectionException
        Returns the value to which var is bound in this answer
        Parameters:
        var - a variable for which this answer provides a binding.
        Returns:
        the value to which var is bound.
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException

      • getBindings

        Map<CycVariable,Object> getBindings()
                                    throws CycConnectionException
        Returns the set of bindings for this answer for all query variables.
        Returns:
        the set of bindings.
        Throws:
        CycConnectionException

      • getId

        InferenceAnswerIdentifier getId()
        Returns the identifier for this answer.
        Returns:
        the identifier for this answer.

        Collection<InformationSource> getSources(InformationSource.CitationGenerator citationGenerator)
                                         throws CycConnectionException
        Return the sources to which this answer is attributed.
        Returns:
        the sources to which this answer is attributed.
        Throws:

      • getAnswerID

        int getAnswerID()
        Returns the identifier for this answer within its inference. The first answer has the identifier 0.
        Returns:
        the identifier for this answer within its inference
